content.rendered:
So we now have wireless voice assisstants in watches, smart systems in cars, and driverless cars.

Has it occurred to anyone that we might only be a very small step away from…

(And no, I’m NOT referring to Hoff’s haircut)

excerpt.rendered: With all this “smart” technology everywhere, has it occurred to anyone that we might only be a very small step away from…
